title: OceanMind – Coastal Pollution Tracker
goal: Detect pollution intensity and map risk zones using satellite data.
why_it_matters: Coastal pollution impacts fisheries and tourism, but monitoring is weak.
data: Sentinel-2 or MODIS satellite imagery, ocean turbidity datasets.
ai: Image segmentation to detect high turbidity zones.
Correlation with weather and ship-route data.
workflow: Process satellite imagery for coastal regions.
Overlay with weather and shipping data.
outcome: Advanced geospatial ML project with sustainability impact.
